question.questionText: Draw an arrow to show which direction the water flows in the river. (Rose Mountain is on the left and Happy Valley is on the right in the drawing.) Why do you think the water flows in that direction?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Water will always flow downhill (mountain to valley).
